overview: After many years Rodolphe returns back to the place where he grew up. However, the old mansion is now empty. He passes by the stable where he glances through the dusty window and all of a sudden all the memories flash back: What a great fuck he had with that cute young stable lad… In the entrance hall he remembers his three best mates fucking each other all over the place! In the staircase Lee used to ram his huge boner up the hot tight ass of Bart In his room under the rooftop his mates Philip and Daniel met from time to time to suck their giant cocks or just for a good fuck until the white creamy juice splashed all over the place. In the living room Rodolphe finds a used slip. Its smell brings back the hottest memories of a great gang bang with 8 of his best friends. Nine hot cocks and nine hungry holes!
title: Blast from the Past
